info.description:
This page contains the documentation of the backend of Stubi.

Repositories

  • Stubi Frontend
  • Stubi Backend

Authentication

Most of the endpoints are not public and need a proper authentication. The following is a list of tokens that can be used for testing purposes in this documentation. It is important that you use the whole token including the string "Bearer". Click on "Authorize" in the upper right corner and copy one of these tokens to authenticateyourself. All subsequent requests will then be sent together with this token.

Tokens

  • Admin Token: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJhZG1pbiIsImV4cCI6MTY0ODM5NTI5OX0.6M2JFiexb08iNF1D1Mj1MGw0Brqr3Kz7QWbobMW4pDQnjVfgjU7JHZ4Pkba2JINIg0CuiJBYzOfhpyo679CODg
  • User Token: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJ1c2VyIiwiZXhwIjoxNjQ4Mzk0ODg0fQ.VkIApvDlHToVDa4CNjHi-I_SZ1HdYOQv3T0-iC-o-O4U3uYqUEYX7ZHOMQH2jATb3Z_Pycqp9K-SBKaB5BpAyw

tags.name: Developer Endpoints

createdBy.description: Full name of the news item creator

createdById.description: The database generated user id of the news item creator

creationDate.description: The date the news item was created

disabled.description: Whether the news item is temporarily disabled and not visible to users

endDate.description: The date from which the news entry will no longer be visible to users

link.description: HTTP link to another website for reference

startDate.description: The date from which the news entry will be visible to users

id.description: Database generated id of the user account that was authenticated

lastname.description: Last name of the user account that was authenticated

refreshToken.description: Token uniquely associated with a user account used to refresh the user token

token.description: Authentication token with which users authenticate themselves

username.description: Unique username of the user account that solely belongs the registration code

timestamp.description: Some arbitrary timestamp. Usually the moment some event on the frontend side occurred.

link.description: HTTP link to another website for reference

startDate.description: The date from which the news entry will be visible to users

code.description: 4-digit long registration code used for initial authentication of a user account
